advancements.beautify.blinds.description: Craft blinds to filter some light.
advancements.beautify.blinds.title: Blinded by the lights
advancements.beautify.bookstack.descript: Who needs shelves anyways? Craft a bookstack.
advancements.beautify.bookstack.title: No shelf organization
advancements.beautify.candelabra.title: Wicked!
advancements.beautify.hanging_pot.title: Left hanging
advancements.beautify.light.title: Lit!
advancements.beautify.root.description: The devil is in the detailing.
advancements.beautify.root.title: Let's Beautify!
advancements.beautify.rope.description: Tie String together to receive Rope.
advancements.beautify.rope.title: Could you knot?
bamboo_lamp.description1: Can be placed hanging and standing like Lanterns.
blinds.description1: Right-click on Block to open or close blind and adjacent ones.
blinds.description2: After closing 1st time, blinds below topmost blind become invisible when open.
bookstack.description1: Shift-Right-click on block to change the arrangement.
candelabra.description1: Can be placed hanging and standing like Lanterns.
candelabra.description2: Right-click with hand to turn off.
candelabra.description3: Right-click with Flint and Steel to turn on.
frame.description1: Places Frame with a random motive.
frame.description2: Shift-Right-click on Block to change the picture.
glowstone_essence_lamp.description1: Can be placed hanging and standing like Lanterns.
glowstone_essence_lamp.description2: Right-click with Glowstone Dust to fill.
hanging_pot.description1: Can be placed hanging on blocks, Ropes or on ground as usual.
hanging_pot.description2: Right-click with plants to pot them.
hanging_pot.description3: Right-click with Bone Meal to grow the plant further. Trim with shears to shorten and receive plant item.
hanging_pot.list2: All normal flowers + Rose Bushes, Lilacs, Peonies, Sunflowers, Vines, Weeping Vines, Twisting Vines, Glow Lichen, Glow Berries, Sweet Berries, Grass, Fern
light_bulb.description1: Can be placed hanging and standing like Lanterns.
rope.description2: Used to elongate the Rope of Hanging Pots
text.autoconfig.beautify.option.blinds.o: Opens blinds from the topmost blind on if true.
text.autoconfig.beautify.option.blinds.s: Searches X-Blocks(x = Search Radius) below and X/2 to the sides of the clicked blind for others and opens/closes them too.
text.autoconfig.beautify.option.houses.b: Defines the chance of a Botanist Villager House inside a village.
text.autoconfig.beautify.title: Beautify
tooltip.beautify.blinds.1: Right click to open or close all adjacent blinds.
tooltip.beautify.blinds.2: After closing for the first time, the blinds below the uppermost shutter are no longer visible when opened.
tooltip.beautify.bookstack.1: Place a random stack of books, sneaking right-click on the block to change the model.
tooltip.beautify.bookstack.2: Increase the power of the Enchantment Table like bookshelves.
tooltip.beautify.botanist_workbench.1: Workbench for Botanist Villagers, also for decoration.
tooltip.beautify.candelabra.1: Can be placed hanging and standing like Lanterns.
tooltip.beautify.candelabra.2: Right click with empty hand to extinguish.
tooltip.beautify.candelabra.3: Right click with Flint and Steel to light up.
tooltip.beautify.hanging_pot.1: Can be placed hanging on blocks, Ropes or on ground as usual.
tooltip.beautify.hanging_pot.2: Right click to pot up plants.
tooltip.beautify.hanging_pot.3: Right click with Bone Meal to grow the plant further. Trim with shears to shorten and recieve plant item.
tooltip.beautify.lamp.1: Can be placed hanging and standing like Lanterns.
tooltip.beautify.lamp_jar.1: Can be placed hanging and standing like Lanterns.
tooltip.beautify.lamp_jar.2: Tweaks brightness by filling with Glowstone Dust.
tooltip.beautify.lamp_jar.3: Right click with empty hand to take out the Glowstone Dust.
tooltip.beautify.picture_frame.2: Sneaking right-click on the frame to change the picture inside the frame.
tooltip.beautify.plantlist: Hold CTRL for a list of plants.
tooltip.beautify.rope.1: Can be placed like chains and climbable.
tooltip.beautify.trellis.1: Can be placed on wall or ceiling and can be climbed.
tooltip.beautify.trellis.2: Right click on plants in your hand to place it in.
tooltip.control: Hold CTRL for a list of plants.
trellis.description1: Can be placed on or like walls and on the ceiling. Climbable.
trellis.list2: Rose Bushes, Sunflowers, Peonies, Lilacs, Vines, Weeping Vines, Twisting Vines, Glow Lichen
